data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Progress,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let value = 0.5;
</script>

<Progress shape="circle" {value} />
<Progress {value} />

<Button
    palette="negative"
    on:click={() =>
        (value = Math.max(0, value - 0.05))}
>
    -0.05
</Button>

<Button
    palette="affirmative"
    on:click={() =>
        (value = Math.min(1, value + 0.05))}
>
    +0.05
</Button>
data.title: Progress Preview
